name: Atoms Not Smart Contracts: A New Kind of World Computer
description: The internet is a protocol for sharing files. The EVM serves as a protocol for a shared computer that. Much like our personal computers, this shared computer is governed by account-centric permissions, thus leading to ownership-centric apps. The "shared computer protocol" of our universe, on the other hand, is governed by physics, not accountsâ€”leading to the most emergent world we know of. Is it feasible to replicate such a system?

speakers.name: Wand
speakers.bio: In the pursuit of a powerful internet where our use of computing shifts from mere tasks and productivity towards tools for exploration, modeling, coordination, and worldbuilding. Interested in The Design Directions: New Representations for New Mediums, Plural Worldbuilding, Digital Physics, Language of Truth, Simulation + Creation Markets.
